text: Nabiyow kitab marak sin diinil Anqasa marak, Qhiyaamah Ayr√≥ Yallih xaqul umaanch umuk Raqta galto-le mara siinih warsoo? keenik ixxic, Yalli isi Racmatak yeyxeereeh yinqibeeh tu-kak damaaqee kee ceray abe maraa kee Sheytan kee Yallak kalah tanim yaqbude mara, woo mari usun akeeral arac umaaneh lafitak Raaqaah Addunyal Massa-le gitak makkootiyyah lafitak Raaqa mara
